title: 8-18  Twin primes
description:
Twin primes are a pair of two prime numbers that differ by 2.
For example, 3 and 5 are twin primes, 5 and 7 are twin primes, 11 and 13 are twin primes.
Write a program to find all twin primes less than the a specified number n.
output: The number of twin primes less than n.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
